3: Tch... Seems like they were prepared for a brute-force filtering.
All the tracks in this area... are legitimate. They all spread out in different directions while still being connected to each other...
Crossing, interrupting, skipping, camouflaging... This maze of tracks was specifically designed to counteract brute-force filtering.

2: Guess we can now only count on... our instincts.

3: I see... So instead of trying to crack it with your computing power, you're using the guiding function on the reinforced sensor of the Inver-Device?
This track... is pointing toward the way we came.
This means if we hadn't come across this path, we'd have found ourselves getting further away from the target the longer we chase it...
We have no time to waste now. We need to report this.
If we lost this fight, Asimov would need to be prepared.
Roger that. Let's find a place nearby with better connection so we can report the situation.
